title: Chocolate chip cookie dough pots
description: My children love a chocolate chip cookie so gooey on the inside that I can’t really make the outside firm enough to let the cookies keep integrity of form. This, then, is the solution: a cookie dough you bake in a little dish, and then eat with a spoon, dolloped with ice cream or crème fraîche as desired. For this recipe you will need 6 ramekins approximately 8cm/3¼in diameter x 4½cm/1¾in deep (approximately 200ml/7fl oz capacity)
ingredients: ice cream or, crème fraiche, to serve
